$ref.description: Path to content that replaces the $ref

participant_id.description: ID of the flight planner into which test data can be injected

scd_injection_base_url.description: Base URL for the flight planner's implementation of the interfaces/automated_testing/scd/v1/scd.yaml API

timeout_seconds.description: Number of seconds to allow for requests to this flight planner.  If None, use default.

v1_base_url.description: Base URL for the flight planner's implementation of the interfaces/automated_testing/flight_planning/v1/flight_planning.yaml API
